DrawTo_InvalidPosition_ShouldThrowException()

Tests the DrawTo(int, int) method with invalid coordinates. Verifies that a BOOSE.CanvasException is thrown.

[TestMethod]
[ExpectedException(typeof(CanvasException))]
public void DrawTo_InvalidPosition_ShouldThrowException()
